'''Rocksteady''' is an event-exclusive variant of the '''Stretchy Geo Fungus''' that appears in the [[Lil' Fungi's Fun-Tastic Fiesta]] event.

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Stretchy Geo Fungus V3

|name_1      = Sturdy Slam
|desc_1      = Leaps high and strikes the ground, dealing '''1000% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} to nearby opponents.

|name_2      = Solidified Crystal
|desc_2      = After each of Rocksteady's Normal Attacks hits, Skill DMG will increase by '''20%'''. This buff can stack up to 4 times and will be removed after using a Skill.

|name_3      = Normal Attack
|desc_3      = Deals '''360% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} to nearby opponents using its flapping cap.
}}
